title: Adaptive Connectionism-Based MOOC for Strengthening Social Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate understanding of social studies
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environments with flexible scheduling for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can construct personalized knowledge networks by applying connectionist learning principles
Learners can select optimal learning pathways based on data analysis to solve job-related problems in social fields
Learners can complete two or more practical tasks per week using multimedia content optimized for mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
